attributes.review: this app gave me depression. it gave me anxiety. i have ptsd because of this app. now i have to pay extra for a SECOND therapist because just one wasn’t cutting it. :/ this app spat on my dog and kicked my grandma. i don’t trust anyone who uses it and i can’t believe i ever downloaded it 😭😩😔this app shouldn’t even be allowed on the appstore because i NEVER want someone to have the same experiences that i did :( i’m disappointed in the quality and will never be getting my life back 💔💔💔
attributes.title: this app should be deleted!!

attributes.review: i was on the app, just looking to see how things are going yk . and it really says “ vote for trump “ like who would say such a racist and horrible thing ! brainwashing people into thinking trump is a good president ? OMG .! this should be illegal .! it’s literally promoting violence for not only children but adult , showing people that it’s okay to hate on women and men or even people of color besides orange !. it’s outrageous !! the creators outta be ashamed of themselves .! this game is honestly so pathetic and needs to be removed from the app store IMMEDIATELY!!
attributes.title: literally the worst app ever !

attributes.review: This app blew up my iPad luckily not my phone it burnt down my whole neighborhood and then the iPad started glitching and saying kill the Cheeto man and blm 💫🌟🌺 this app also gave me  the corona virus and i am now in the hospital 🙈 oh and also this blew up my ramen 🍜😗 so I would like that to be paid for ❤️✨ and also I would love if ✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿 oops my emojis keep doing that sorry rapist I meant racist I meant stupid sorry autocorrect I want to kill u with a baguette 🥖 omg my keyboard keeps typing on its own 😡😭 so I wouldn’t recommend this app😗🙈
attributes.title: So inconvenient 😡😡😡

attributes.review: This app might as well have been made by Jar Jar Binks. It gave my entire family head lice and ate all of the food in our fridge within the first four minutes of having it downloaded on my phone. This app then proceeded to slash my tires and steal all of my grandmothers depends, causing her to have a terrible and incredibly embarrassing blowout in front of all her friends at the nursing home. The app made fun of my Quadriplegic neighbor, Tim, and then covered all of my families beds in jello. Absolutely horrible and will be deleting immediately.
attributes.title: The wörst

attributes.review: i downloaded in hopes of being up to date with the great things the president has done for this country and unfortunately nothing can be found to back that up bc the format of the app is completely glitching, the whole layout of the app is just way unorganized. extremely disappointed. i thought the presidents team would have fixed this problem but it’s almost been four years and there is no hope left🧚🏼‍♀️
attributes.title: DISAPPOINTED🧚🏼‍♀️🧚🏼‍♀️🧚🏼‍♀️🧚🏼‍♀️

attributes.review: This app is honestly terrible, as a trumpet/trumpanzee, this app has an awful amount of glitches. I would not recommend this app at ALL. This app is so terrible and glitchy, it is pretty much ban worthy at this point. Not only is this app glitchy, but the notifications as you try to sleep at night is super annoying, AND the way it works is so confusing and also boring and not entertaining as a trumpet. 0/10 would not recommend downloading this app if you’re a fellow trumpet.
attributes.title: Absolutely HORRIBLE

attributes.review: you might as well just delete the app it will steal your phone and hack it. here’s how and why first i was biking to target and while in my car my phone started dinging so i turned it off silent mode to see what it was but i fell off my horse and there wasn’t anything there. When i finally got to target where the cat greeted me while i left i checked my ipad and my phones home screen was trump while i hopped on my hawk my phone started ringing and it was gone.
attributes.title: Might as well just delete the app

attributes.review: I seriously cannot believe how bad this makes our president look, they spent no time programming is app!! Everytime i try to look stuff up or anything like that this app spams me to pay trump, while i would love to donate and i have already, I just dont have bucket loads of money, he must have plenty already!! Also, i got 2 viruses that turned my phone orange!! i seriously would recommend you all stay away from this app!!!!! It needs to be fixed asap!!
attributes.title: How could it be this bad?!

attributes.review: I cannot express the disgust that slithered into my body when I opened this app. Not only did it call me a Thug and a Rapist, but it also tried to induct me into the KKKLAN. I was tear gassed and then an upside down bible appeared on the screen. I will NEVER be using this app again seeing as how it tried to gRAB ME BY THE ✨woman area✨ and didn’t release its tax information . I hate the color orange and it keeps showing me this man that decided to roll around in it. I also hate the logo because it’s so obvious that the main character is wearing a toupee.
attributes.title: UNACCEPTABLE

attributes.review: This app is DISGUSTING!! The amount of homophobic, misogynistic, and racist STENCH from this app is unforgivable! Imagine supporting an orange Cheeto Puff... Child anyways- Apple really did bad by making this an app and they better take it down in the future 👁👄👁 I cant stand this app. It crashes, the people are horrible human beings and it’s all about trump... WHO WANTS THAT!! Not to mention they stole my pet snail, Christopher, and said they’ll never give him back 😔🤚 I’m still mourning but at least this app will be gone so thanks for the sacrifice Chris... may you Rest In Peace 😔💅✨
attributes.title: ✨ disgusting ✨
